name: Omira
description: Omira Labs is an organization focused on applying predictive intelligence within DeFi. The first and most practical application of Omira's technology is the Omira B.B4 model, which delivers sentiment-driven price predictions on specified assets. $OMIRA is the native currency of Omira Labs - its holders gain unrestricted access to Omira's predictive models and are entitled to earning opportunities related to revenue streams and collaborative model training programs.
